text: Rüti can refer to: * Rüti, Glarus * Rüti, Zürich * Rüti bei Büren in Berne * Rüti bei Lyssach in Berne * Rüti bei Riggisberg in Berne The names of the following places have the same origin: * the municipality Rüte in Appenzell Innerrhoden * the municipality Rüthi in St. Gallen * the municipality Rüttenen in Solothurn
title: Rüti
